name: Vision by ZERO GAMES
description:
Vision is a 3D Puzzle game where you play as a robot trying to a save a planet from fading. 

Controls: 

Movement - General Movement: WASD / Jump: Spacebar

Gameplay Controls: 

Fire Beam: Left Mouse Button

Inventory: (E if toggled controls, Right Mouse Button if hold controls)

Select Element While Inventory is Active: Left Mouse Button

Activate Wisp Spawn: F

Confirm Wisp Spawn: (After F has been pressed) Left Mouse Button

Return to Robot: (While Wisp) F
